Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.beans

Class GameBean

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.beans.GameBean
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observer
public class GameBean
extends java.lang.Object
implements Observer
Class used to serialize a Game object, send it over the network and store its information in the client

      public java.lang.String getCurrentPlayer()

      Returns:

    • getTurnOrder

      public java.lang.String[] getTurnOrder()
      Getter for the game's turn order
      Returns:
      an array of the player's usernames as Strings, following turn order

    • getConnectedPlayers

      public boolean[] getConnectedPlayers()
      Getter for the status of connection for the game's players
      Returns:
      an array of the player's connection status (true - connected, false - disconnected), following turn order

    • getTurnPhase

      public TurnPhase getTurnPhase()
      Getter for the game's turn phase
      Returns:
      the game's current turn phase

    • getLeaderCardFromId

      public LeaderCard getLeaderCardFromId​(int id) throws CardNotPresentException
      Getter for the leader card corresponding to a specific card id. The first time this method is called, LeaderCard objects are created
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the leader card
      Returns:
      the LeaderCard with the given id
      Throws:
      CardNotPresentException - if the given id does not correspond to any card

    • getWinner

      public java.lang.String getWinner()
      Returns the username of the game's winner
      Returns:
      the game's winner. 'null' if the game is not over

    • getWinnerVp

      public int getWinnerVp()
      Returns the number of victory points of the game's winner
      Returns:
      the winner's victory points. 'null' if the game is not over
